message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $9500. I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $11000. This is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $8000. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you!
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $9500 is the maximum I can afford. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10250. I hope we can come to an agreement.
